author: cms-sw
body:
@fabiocos and @kpedro88 , this PR should allow Kevin the L1 rights. Kevin this means when you say +1 then it will be treated at approval for all categories for which you are L2 and approval for ORP too.
You need to explicitly say +upgrade or +orp to sign for individual categories.
title: added @kpedro88 as release manager
